actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to allow appointment to the Board of Governors without regard to Federal Reserve districts.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to repeal the restriction on appointments to the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System which permits only one Board member from any one Federal Reserve district.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to allow appointment to the Board of Governors without regard to Federal Reserve districts.
